column5: So my parents got sick of me pestering them for money too buy new fishing stuff so they told me it was time too get a job, so where do i turn TIMMIES!!!!   LOL, minimum wage and early weekend mornings missing my fishing shows , it'll all be worth it for the money
in the end bud its all worth  what kind of fih do u fish for anyway
HAHAHAH good job marcus!   now how are ya s'posed to land a lunker if you're at work?
definatly worth it. Steelhead and Bass with my fly Gear, and I need to get some spinning tackle too
Now's the time to save up for them fishing dreams.
Attaboy, Marcus.  Paying your own way will make your successes all the sweeter.
lol i lasted 3 months at timmys man i wish u GL
definatly , cathcing the fish will be o' so much sweeter knowing I paid for the gear! , I dunno how ill get a lunker at work, I might have too sneak out and get to the river

Its a fast paced work place, might make the shifts go faster for you or it might drive you insane. I know I couldnt do it but I have alot of friends that worked there through highschool and didnt mind the pace of it all.  If youre looking for another job in highschool head to your local grocery store, easiest job you will ever have and a lot less stressful (part time jobs should NOT be stressfull)  good luck bud, I know as soon as I got a job I started buying fishin stuff all the time!

Good For You!  Whatever your job is, you appreciate everything more, knowing that you worked for it and paid for it with your own money! Show us some pics of the first fish you catch on the lure that YOU paid for!  Oh...i'll have an XL 2 milk and 1 sugar.  Thanks

oh ya, I worked 3 years of customer service in highschool and I have one tip for you. DONT let angry customers get to you. There will be lots, youd be surprised how mad people get when there is 2 sugar in their coffee instead of 1.
Lol, thanx for the tips guys, I applied to sobeys to like stock the shelves and they narrowed it down too me and an older guy on who they wanted too hire, and they chose him  :|

Sounds like pretty good training for the post education years.  It's ironic how so many of us couldn't wait to become adults, and once we got there we wished we could be kids again. Some of us have managed to make the reversion.  JF
I'm almost there.
Mine's a Double Double!
Sweet, just let us know what location and you'll be hookin' us up with coffee
I first job was at Dominon (Now METRO)...Greatest job I ever had stocking the dairy case for three years... I never gained so much muscle lifting crates and drinking free milk all day lol
which timmies are you at?? I may  have to stop by
mmmust rrressist.. police.. donut.. coffee.. argh.  congrats marcus!  my first job was delivering flyers (junk mail) to homes so I know all about irate people!
What's the OFC discount these days? 10% still??
Im at bayview and Mulock in Newmarket, I'll hook you up

HAHAHAHAHAHAH    obviously you didnt work in produce!!    4am-11am non stop doin somethin one break and never get to sit! hard on the body but the walleye didnt start to bite till 3 anyhow.    had a nice cozy bed in the ice shack!
HAH! I've been deliverin' junk mail & fliers for over 20 years . . .
Large Double Double and a Double chocolate donut.   Good Stuff.    Now no-one can tell you what to spend money on.   It's yours to spend.   Until you get married.
hahaha lol, thats a ways away...I hope
